term.title: exchange extraction

item.text: An extraction operation or process in which a metal from one phase is exchanged with the equivalent amount of a second metal from the other phase.

notes.item: This term may be used in connection with any step (e.g. loading, scrubbing (in solvent extraction) (in solvent extration, in atmospheric chemistry) or stripping (in solvent extraction) (in solvent extration, in atmospheric chemistry) in a process).
This applies also to organic or molecular species.
